sources.title: Black Orchid
sources.description: Title: Black Orchid Summary: A doctor's ex-wife dies of nicotine poison. Directed by: Charles Saunders Actors: Ronald Howard, Olga Edwardes, John Bentley Production Company: Kenilworth Film Productions Release Date: February 1953 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A doctor's ex-wife dies of nicotine poison.

metadata.Plot: A doctor's ex-wife dies of nicotine poison.
metadata.Writer: Francis Edge, John Temple-Smith, Maurice Temple-Smith
metadata.Actors: Ronald Howard, Olga Edwardes, John Bentley
